column4: Have quick question..   The EVDO KPC650 card keeps freezing.  It seems like it is usbserial issue.  Does anyone have idea to resolve this issue?
when it freezes does it take down the whole system?
nothing in dmesg when KPC650 freezes.
understood.  not sure howto debug it.  what is an evdo card?
Verizon Wireless  card that acts like USBSerial device to connect to internet
